tableDependencies: SELECT table_name AS table_name, referenced_table_name AS referenced_table_name FROM information_schema.key_column_usage WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND referenced_table_name IS NOT NULL
getTables: SELECT table_name AS name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = DATABASE() AND table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
createTempTable: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE {{tableName}}_temp AS SELECT * FROM {{tableName}}
